page.title: 06TRADE SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: On the{Tesco's}building site about 150 employees work, for 60 hours out of a full week. When construction work is finished, there will be ten other shops and a new{library}with a clock tower. There will also be a new {community centre}for which Tesco have contributed Â£1/2 million. To make way for the building work, four houses had to be demolished, includng the{Guides' hut. A deal was made which resulted in the Guides' HQ being transferred to newer, better premises. Mr Symonns supplied some statistics: {materials used}_ 500,000 face bricks, 6,700 cubic metres of reinforced concrete, 85,000 concrete bricks, 600 tonnes of metal bars and 275,000 roof tiles; cost _ Â£6.7 million. I enjoyed talking to Mr Symonns. We chatted about other things as well as the building site.
